about_the_game:
Join the battle, armed with the ExoTanks Premium pack.

When you purchase the ExoTanks Premium pack, you will receive:
- Early access to the game,
- Five killer-machines of the future:
- Two PREMIUM camouflages for the D4 Diablo and FS-189 Saboteur tanks.

New camouflage will highlight you and your unique style of play against other similar looking tanks.

Make the premium camouflage your calling card.

Premium camouflage for premium players.

Hurry up! Sale of the package is limited in time.

Break into the battle! Surprise everyone with the new design of Diablo and Saboteur.

See you on Mars!

Join the battle, armed with the ExoTanks Premium pack.

When you purchase the ExoTanks Premium pack, you will receive:

- Two PREMIUM camouflages for the D4 Diablo and FS-189 Saboteur tanks.

New camouflage will highlight you and your unique style of play against other similar looking tanks.

Make the premium camouflage your calling card.

Premium camouflage for premium players.

Hurry up! Sale of the package is limited in time.

Break into the battle! Surprise everyone with the new design of Diablo and Saboteur.

See you on Mars!

name: ExoTanks - PREMIUM PACKAGE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3220 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 620 (1GB VRAM) or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050TI (4 ГБ) / Radeon RX 570 (4 ГБ)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: A fast-paced Sci-Fi Shooter game based on tank warfare on the vast areas of planet Mars! Master unique tanks, each having particular abilities, mechanics, and appearance. Upgrade your tank during the battle. Immerse yourself in the Sci-Fi world.
